name: Jigsaw Puzzle World
description:
Discover a vibrant world of jigsaw puzzles.
Piece together high-quality photographic images featuring countries, animals, technology and much more!

Enjoy a selection of 40 free puzzles, expanding your collection with DLC.
Customize your game with jigsaw size and piece shape options. The puzzles can be as challenging as you decide.
Enjoy an immersive puzzle experience, with a clean interface and relaxing soundtrack.
Complete jigsaw puzzles to earn Steam achievements and unlock hidden bonus puzzles.

Are you ready? Begin your puzzle world adventure!
